name: kl
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
abbreviation for Kuala Lumpur, the capital city of Malaysia: We arrive in KL at 8.05. Some foreigners think Kuala Lumpur is some kind of village but KL is a big city
More examplesFewer examplesHe works at the US embassy at KL.Nobody from KL actually calls KL Kuala Loco.In Malaysia, all roads lead to KL.
